mapper.select: SELECT u_auth FROM sbp_auth WHERE 1=1 AND u_id = #{username}

SELECT u_id as username, u_password as password, u_name as uName, u_isAccountNonExpired as isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked as isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired as isCredentialsNonExpired, u_isEnabled as isEnabled FROM sbp_user WHERE 1=1 AND u_id = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sbp_user ( u_id, u_password, u_name, u_isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired, u_isEnabled ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{uName}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isEnabled} )
